title: checksum for xz corrupted
body:
-----

Summary

I just wanted to install `hdf5@1.8.15` with a fresh clone of spack (189d9ec138393fe6b86cd3b86766a5ddb4d80850)

### Expected Result

that it works and installs hdf5

### Actual Result

```
# spack install -j2 hdf5@1.8.16
==> libsigsegv is already installed in /spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14.04-x86_64/gcc-4.8/libsigsegv-2.11-fotodb6juijan3ttm6xwhg34zj23igyt
==> m4 is already installed in /spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14.04-x86_64/gcc-4.8/m4-1.4.18-r26rlmg5rzkoec4ekzsee5vkgxxtt57h
==> libtool is already installed in /spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14.04-x86_64/gcc-4.8/libtool-2.4.6-qejqffffrzzu2uqeyip5lxsx72oqbxa7
==> pkgconf is already installed in /spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14.04-x86_64/gcc-4.8/pkgconf-1.4.0-ygcoovvugha7knc6m4n7y2cgjoqozkp6
==> util-macros is already installed in /spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14.04-x86_64/gcc-4.8/util-macros-1.19.1-mhmq2agetb5hdbv6hmjsllkwzghzxzo7
==> libpciaccess is already installed in /spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14.04-x86_64/gcc-4.8/libpciaccess-0.13.5-csy7hfly5mdst6jy35kgkyzq2um6qltq
==> Installing xz
==> Fetching http://tukaani.org/xz/xz-5.2.3.tar.bz2
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Warning: The contents of 
  the archive
   look like HTML.
  The checksum will likely be bad.  If it is, you can use
  'spack clean <package>' to remove the bad archive, then
  fix your internet gateway issue and install again.
==> Error: ChecksumError: md5 checksum failed for /spack/var/spack/stage/xz-5.2.3-ekob74s54rmah2oph3p6tjo6dxa73vf7/xz-5.2.3.tar.bz2
    Expected 1592e7ca3eece099b03b35f4d9179e7c but got cb530d737c8f2d1023797cf0587b4e05
ChecksumError: ChecksumError: md5 checksum failed for /spack/var/spack/stage/xz-5.2.3-ekob74s54rmah2oph3p6tjo6dxa73vf7/xz-5.2.3.tar.bz2
    Expected 1592e7ca3eece099b03b35f4d9179e7c but got cb530d737c8f2d1023797cf0587b4e05

/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1006, in do_fetch:
     29            self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
     30    
     31            if spack.do_checksum and self.version in self.versions:
  >> 32                self.stage.check()
     33    
     34            self.stage.cache_local()
```
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ git clone https://github.com/spack/spack
$ . spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh
$ spack install hdf5@1.8.16
```

### Information on your system

This includes:

 1. which platform you are using
fresh pull of ubuntu/trusty from dockerhub

 2. any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.)
this is using the vanilla dockerhub ubuntu trusty container

-----
